ygData.messageBody:
It is my understanding that every item that drops in the PoG is also
questable there (I could be wrong). I am personally a follower of
Quellious, so I dont have any specific restrictions (other than roleplaying
ones) about hunting in the PoG.

Lago

> From: James Schuldes [SMTP:jgs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 10:12 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Avoiding faction hits in PoG when pulling
>
> What I dont understand is: why is our loot dropping there?
>
> Yes, there are quests that offer very similar rewards but have you tried
> to
> get them? PoG drops the items, Giants simply do not drop the items (needed
> for questing) at a rate anywhere close to PoG *and* some gems are still
> not
> found yet.
>
> I would guess that Verant made a mistake in PoG - I am guessing that they
> thought it would be uber-hard - or at least as hard as the "other ways" to
> get the similar items.
>
> They continue to fail to understand what motivates the players. On top of
> that, they do not structure the "reward system" to support the "content"
> (role play, history, lore, etc) or background story. In some ways, it is
> interesting that players can "choose" who to side with but it is a joke
> for
> them to ignore the fact that the majority of players will follow the
> course
> of least resistence toward the path of the most loot.
>
> Sylly
